citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, a metal kennel containing a large mixed breed dog, located along the wall opposite the entry
door in the dog ward, had a large area of rust along the lower left perimeter. The rusted area of the kennel measured 6.5
inches (W) x 5 inches (L) and was extensively corroded where parts of the metal was dark brown with gaps/holes and
raised away from the surface. Extensive rust on a primary enclosure can negatively impact the structural integrity of the
enclosure and consequently harm the animal contained therein. Primary enclosures must be designed and constructed of
suitable materials so that they are structurally sound and must be kept in good repair.
Correct by: May 4, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
At the time of inspection, a metal kennel containing a large mixed breed dog, located along the wall opposite the entry 
door in the dog ward, had a large area of rust along the lower left perimeter. The rusted area of the kennel measured 6.5 
inches (W) x 5 inches (L) and was extensively corroded where parts of the metal was dark brown with gaps/holes and 
raised away from the surface. Extensive rust on a primary enclosure can negatively impact the structural integrity of the 
enclosure and consequently harm the animal contained therein. Primary enclosures must be designed and constructed of 
suitable materials so that they are structurally sound and must be kept in good repair.  
 
Correct by: May 4, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
